# Invitation to Qualify for Mechanical Work Package B: Canadian High Arctic Research Station
## Commercial Item Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4601250839
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-31
* **Invitation to Qualify Closing Date:** 2024-06-26T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Registration and Eligibility:** Bidders are required to be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) for this solicitation.

### Scope of Work
This ITQ solicitation is for the first phase of a two-phase process where the PSPC will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers. The work comprises renovations of the mechanical systems at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS), including, but not limited to:

* Adding an effluent treatment system to serve the existing Necropsy Laboratory in the Main Research Building (MRB)
* Replacing trench drain grates and drainage piping serving the Wet Lab of the Laboratory in the Main Research Building (MRB)
* Adding a pump out system and drainage to serve the existing Laydown tank within the Main Research Building (MRB)

### Selection Criteria
Bidders will undergo a two-phase evaluation process, the first phase evaluating their qualifications and the second phase inviting qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project. The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Notice and Contact
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19881880?extsite=MTk4ODE4ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contact Person:** Vinay Singh, vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Amendments
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time for this solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the invitation to qualify closing date and time.
